seo.description: Local color picker for Spoolman with a filament carousel.

changelog.title: What's New

hero.title: Visual Filament Color Browser
hero.subtitle: Beautiful, Interactive Interface for Your Spoolman Collection
hero.description: Browse your 3D printing filament collection visually. Connect to your {spoolman} instance and see all your colors at a glance.
hero.requiresText: This app connects to your own {spoolman} server. All data stays between your browser and your Spoolman instance ‚Äî no central database, no external storage.

testimonial.name: Marco
testimonial.quote1: As a passionate 3D printing enthusiast, I found myself constantly struggling with one simple question:
testimonial.quote1Bold: What color was that filament again?
testimonial.quote2: Spoolman is an amazing tool for managing filament inventory, but when it comes to browsing colors visually, it falls short. I wanted something that would let me
testimonial.quote2Bold: see my entire collection at a glance
testimonial.quote2Continue: , filter by the colors I need, and quickly find where each spool is stored.
testimonial.quote3: So I built this tool - not just for me, but for everyone who loves the tactile joy of organizing filaments and the visual satisfaction of seeing all those beautiful colors laid out like a digital palette.
testimonial.quote4: It's become an essential part of my workflow, and I hope it helps you as much as it helps me!
testimonial.madeWithLove: Made with love for the 3D printing community
testimonial.poweredBy: Powered by {spoolman} ‚Äî Without this awesome filament management system, this project wouldn't exist. Huge thanks to {donkie} and all contributors!

useCases.title: Perfect For Every Situation
useCases.subtitle: Whether you're planning your next print or organizing your workshop, we've got you covered

items.title: Find the Perfect Color
items.description: Browse through your entire collection visually and find that exact shade you need for your project.

items.title: Plan Your Purchases
items.description: See which colors you already have before buying new filaments. Save money, avoid duplicates.

items.title: Organize Your Workshop
items.description: Track where each spool is stored. No more hunting through boxes to find the right filament.

items.title: Manage Multi-Color Filaments
items.description: Special support for gradient and multi-color spools with visual pattern indicators.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage and browse your filament collection

items.title: Beautiful Color Display
items.description: See your filaments with their actual colors in stunning grid or carousel view

items.title: Smart Filtering
items.description: Filter by vendor, material, color type, location, and more

items.title: Location Tracking
items.description: Track exactly where your spools are stored in your workshop

items.title: Multi-Color Support
items.description: Full support for multi-color filaments with visual indicators

items.title: Responsive Design
items.description: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

items.title: Multi-Language
items.description: Available in multiple languages with easy switching

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Built with modern tech for instant loading and smooth interactions

items.title: Dark/Light Mode
items.description: Choose your preferred theme or let it adapt to your system

items.title: Projects (Beta)
items.description: Import 3D print files and track filament usage with costs
details: View 3D model previews and plate images
Calculate costs per filament, plate, and total

items.title: Data-Focused Interface
items.description: Spoolman excels at managing filament inventory with detailed specifications, weights, and vendor information. But when you're standing at your printer deciding which color to use, scrolling through a data table isn't ideal.

items.title: Color Gets Lost
items.description: Your filaments are beautiful ‚Äî vibrant reds, deep blues, subtle pastels. But in a traditional list view, these colors are reduced to hex codes and small swatches. The visual magic disappears.

solutions.title: Color-First Experience
solutions.description: This app flips the script. Your filaments are displayed as beautiful color cards in a grid or carousel, making it effortless to browse visually and find exactly the shade you're looking for.

solutions.title: Fast & Intuitive
solutions.description: Filter by vendor, material, or location with a single click. Pin your favorite colors. Browse on your phone while standing at your shelf. Everything is designed for speed and visual clarity.

steps.text: "I need a dark blue PETG for this project..."
Filter: Material ‚Üí PETG. Browse the visual grid.
Found it! Navy Blue PETG, Shelf A3, 750g remaining.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Connect your Spoolman instance and start browsing in seconds

steps.title: Enter Your Spoolman URL
steps.description: On first launch, simply provide the URL to your running Spoolman instance (e.g., http://192.168.1.50:7912). This is saved locally in your browser ‚Äî we never send your data anywhere.
steps.tip: üí° Tip: Your Spoolman instance must be network-accessible from where you're browsing.

steps.title: Browse Your Collection
steps.description: The app fetches your filaments directly from Spoolman and displays them as beautiful color cards. Switch between grid view for an overview or carousel view for detailed browsing. All data stays between your browser and your Spoolman server.
steps.tip: üí° Tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to navigate quickly ‚Äî arrow keys in carousel view, Escape to close modals.

steps.title: Filter & Find
steps.description: Use powerful filters to narrow down by vendor, material type, color family, storage location, or multi-color patterns. Pin your favorites to create a custom palette. Search by name or color code for instant results.
steps.tip: üí° Tip: Filters are combinable ‚Äî select "Prusament" + "PETG" + "Location: Shelf A" to drill down precisely.

cta.title: Ready to Organize Your Filaments?
cta.subtitle: Start browsing your filament collection in a beautiful, organized way. It's free, open source, and runs entirely in your browser!

sponsor.title: Support This Project
sponsor.description: Spool Swatch is free and open source. If you like it and want to support its continued development, I'd appreciate a donation!
sponsor.note: Every contribution helps, no matter how small. Thank you for your support! ‚ù§Ô∏è
